The actual NDA areas/polygons were primarily created using narrative description from Federal Register notices and other reports and digitized against basemap data for hydrography and from recent aerial photography.</abstract><purpose>To map and display No Discharge Area (NDA) Areas or zones (polygons) for New York and New Jersey</purpose></descript><timeperd><current>Publication date</current><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>20091123</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>As needed</update></status><accconst>None.</accconst><useconst>None. Please check sources, scale, accuracy, currentness and other available information. Please confirm that you are using the most recent copy of both data and metadata. completeness</complete><posacc><horizpa><horizpar>Linework are accurate compared to orthoimagery at an approximate scale of 1:24,000</horizpar><qhorizpa><horizpav>50</horizpav><horizpae>Visual spot abbreviation SOURCE  Text  3  EPA Region that digitized the NDZ boundary SQ_MI  Numeric    Area of NDZ in square miles ACRES  Numeric    Area of NDZ in acres HECTARES Numeric    Area of NDZ in hectares HYPERLINK1 Text  255  Primary hyperlink to federal register notice listing the NDZ HYPERLINK2 Text  255  Secondary hyperlink to prior or related federal register notice listing the NDZ if
